Package org.mongodb.morphia

This is the base package for all Morphia classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdvancedDatastore
    This interface exposes advanced Datastore features, like interacting with DBObject and low-level options.
    Datastore
    Datastore interface to get/delete/save objects
    EntityInterceptor
    Interface for intercepting @Entity lifecycle events
    ObjectFactory
    The ObjectFactory is used by morphia to create instances of classes which can be customized to fit a particular applications needs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEntityInterceptor  
    DAO<T,K> Deprecated
    use org.mongodb.morphia.dao.BasicDAO
    DatastoreImpl Deprecated
    This is an internal implementation of a published API.
    DeleteOptions
    The options to apply when removing documents from the DBCollection
    FindAndModifyOptions
    The options for find and modify operations.
    InsertOptions
    Options related to insertion of documents into MongoDB.
    Key<T>
    The key object; this class is take from the app-engine datastore (mostly) implementation.
    MapReduceOptions<T>
    This defines options that can be applied to a mapreduce job
    MapreduceResults<T>
    Stores the results of a map reduce operation
    Morphia  
    UpdateOptions
    The options to apply when updating documents in the DBCollection
    ValidationBuilder
    This is an internal class subject to change and removal.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MapreduceType Deprecated
    use MapReduceCommand.OutputType instead
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationException
    Signifies an error trying to authenticate against the database.

Package org.mongodb.morphia Description

This is the base package for all Morphia classes.
